|c|☆MozzieGamesVGC|gg
|c|☆Pkfns|Gg to you too!
|c|☆MozzieGamesVGC|I made this team myself and it honestly is really good
|c|☆MozzieGamesVGC|My Iron Hands have 4 Ivs less than max
|c|☆MozzieGamesVGC|So that I would be faster then other Iron Hands in trickroom
|c|☆Pkfns|If you ever visit the US Id say to do some research on places you wan a vists, look at visiting New York City and maybe try chrcking out a national park while youre here!:) Temperate forests are wild, tons of mushrooms all over the ground if you know how to look!
|c|☆MozzieGamesVGC|:0 Ooooo
|c|☆Pkfns|I love that! I built this team myself, but I built it to be hella meta lmao
|c|☆Pkfns|I really want to be playing Espathra Chi-Yu teams, but they are hard for me to build lol
|c|☆MozzieGamesVGC|My team is heavy trickroom dependent
|c|☆MozzieGamesVGC|I don't like playing meta things personally, mostly cause everyone's playing them and I want to throw things at people that not many people would see
|c|☆MozzieGamesVGC|There's nothing wrong with playing meta things, I just like playing weird things :D
|c|☆Pkfns|Have you tried going just for min speed snd leaning hard into trick room?
|c|☆Pkfns|Back in 2016 when I was actually doing ICs to earn points my best team was Weezing+Dialga Trick Room BEFORE weezing was decent lmao
|c|☆MozzieGamesVGC|No, I'm scared that if that happens, if trick room doesn't go up, I'm basically screwed HAHHAA
|c|☆MozzieGamesVGC|Gen 8 was when I started learning about Pokemon
|c|☆MozzieGamesVGC|But I didn't know how to actually play :<
|j| Bakonlikescufant
|c|☆Pkfns|Most teams are barely trying to respect Trick Room right now, I think with reliable support Mimikyu can def get it up most games possibly! Like Iron Hands Fake Out+Trick Room from Mimi can get you set up more often than not I ghink!:)
|c|☆MozzieGamesVGC|Hmmm maybe
|l| Bakonlikescufant
|c|☆Pkfns|And you do run Amoonguss which can Rage Powder to protect Mimi more for TR setups:)
|c|☆MozzieGamesVGC|Hmmm never thought of that befroe
|c|☆MozzieGamesVGC|I only went with Iron Hands and Kingambit
|c|☆MozzieGamesVGC|with Mimikyu
|c|☆MozzieGamesVGC|I'll definietly try that
|c|☆Pkfns|Iron Hands is awesome next to Mimi, Amoonguss can also help gaurantee your trick room which is sick af!
|c|☆MozzieGamesVGC|MMMM thank you for the advice
|c|☆MozzieGamesVGC|Welp I gotta go
|c|☆Pkfns|Absolutely! I love Trick Room and feel like not enough players explore it atm:)
|c|☆MozzieGamesVGC|It's like 10pm here
|c|☆Pkfns|Have a good one, Mozzie, great to meet you!
|c|☆Pkfns|Goodnight:)
|c|☆MozzieGamesVGC|Good night!
|c|☆Pkfns|Its 9am here lol
|
